Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2015, off Risaburou Eichi (DET)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,920,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2016, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 10/9/2016...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,920,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2017, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/4/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $5,500,000 per year...
